name: Culture and Culinary Tour
description: Indonesia is rich of culture, the position of Jakarta as the capital city of Indonesia become the focus of this trip. You will explore Indonesian culture throughout this trip. This trip will increase your knowledge about Indonesian culture, tradition and history. Not only culture, Indonesia is also rich of foods. There are various types of Indonesian foods which consists of traditional herbs and spices. Through this trip you will enjoy Indonesia with all your five senses.
